Automatic sanity-testing: FAILED BUILD/TEST, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4557_92b8587e1287cf52d753d3c31cf5ee7a32b34a9f/ for binaries and test log.

This could happen for one of several reasons:
1. It chanages paths in makefile.linux-mingw or otherwise changes build scripts in a way that made them incompatible with the automated testing scripts (please tweak those patches in qa/p

ACK

PS. pull tester appears borked again.
Does pyminer support getblocktemplate? The description says it's a getwork miner, but getwork support was removed.\n

@sipa It does not.  pyminer needs to be deleted or updated.

Great project for a bitcoin newbie (ref. http://kernelnewbies.org/ )
@jgarzik Agreed. What would be a good way to advertise such a project?\nMaybe first add a file in doc/ with project descriptions? Then when we have a few, announce on the mailinglist/forums.\n
